chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
items.plainText: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.

items.text: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
items.plainText: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.

items.text: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
items.plainText: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.

items.text: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
items.plainText: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.

items.text: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
items.plainText: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.

items.text: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
items.plainText: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.

items.text: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
items.plainText: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.

items.text: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
items.plainText: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
